title: Small Group Exercise - Start a UML Class Diagram to model the GUI for your Units selection option

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the day
The purpose of this exercise is to make the design choice more concrete by being specific about which classes and methods are needed to implement the GUI for the Units input selection.

attachment: 02 Small Group Exercise - Start a UML Class Diagram to model the GUI for your Units selection option.pdf

questions.questionText: Summarize the Small Group Exercise - Start a UML Class Diagram to model the GUI for your Units selection option
